title: My perfect phone upgrade! - ASUS Zenfone 9
description: Thanks to MANSCAPED for sponsoring the video! Get 20% OFF + Free Shipping at   Riley's a small phone man who's been rocking the Pixel 3 for years now, but he's ready for something new. Is the ASUS Zenfone 9 with its upgraded cameras and features the perfect phone for him?  Buy an Asus Zenfone 9:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Don't you... forget about me 0:09 Introduction 0:55 Unboxing 1:35 Exterior impressions, ports, and features 3:19 Thoughts on charging speeds 3:45 Size impressions 4:35 Sponsor - Manscaped 5:02 Display specs 5:52 Performance impressions  6:28 Speaker/Display comparisons to Google Pixel 3 and iPhone 13 Pro 7:35 Camera specs and impressions 9:02 Video gimbal stabilization testing 9:58 Selfie time 10:20 No wireless charging :( 10:51 Thoughts on ZenUI 10:27 Smart Key impressions 13:06 Labs Testing - Gaming performance  14:18 It's IP68 (kinda?) 14:51 Modular accessories 15:45 Overall thoughts 16:12 Outro
